subject: Golf
PGA Championship
Tennis
Badminton
lead_paragraph: Temperatures in the mid-90s greeted P.G.A. Championship fans and golfers in Johns Creek, Ga., while rain, lots of it, greeted women’s tennis fans in Toronto for the Rogers Cup.
snippet: Temperatures in the mid-90s greeted P.G.A. Championship fans and golfers in Johns Creek, Ga., while rain, lots of it, greeted women’s tennis fans in Toronto for the Rogers Cup.
